title: High-heeled shoe
summary: High-heeled shoes, also known as high heels or simply heels, are a type of shoe in which the heel is tall or raised, resulting in the heel of the wearer's foot being significantly higher off the ground than the wearer's toes. High heels make the wearer appear taller, serve to accentuate the muscle tone in the legs as well as make the wearer's legs appear longer.[1]
